chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
Hq: 0 < q
r: nat
Hr: r = power q 2
Hr': 2 <= r
n: nat
f: nat -> nat

Goal:
(forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
nat_ortho_sum_join : forall (n : nat) f, (forall i j : nat, i <> j -> i < n -> j < n -> f i ⇣ f j = 0) -> ∑ n f = msum nat_join 0 n f
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
nat_ortho_joins : forall (m n : nat) f g, msum nat_join 0 m f ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n g = 0 < -> (forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < n -> f i ⇣ g j = 0)
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
sum_powers_euclid : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall j : nat, j < n -> e 1 <= e (S j)) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = f 0 * power (e 0) r + ∑ n (fun i : nat => f (S i) * power (e (S i) - e 1) r) * power (e 1) r
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) f, k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k) < power n k
power_2_inj : forall i j : nat, power i 2 = power j 2 -> i = j
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
rel_iter.is_digit = fun c q i y : nat => y < q /\ (exists a b : nat, c = (a * q + y) * power i q + b /\ b < power i q) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments rel_iter.is_digit (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
binary_le_power_inv : forall i a b : nat, a ≲ b * power i r -> {a' : nat | a = a' * power i r /\ a' ≲ b}
sum_0n_scal_r : forall (n k : nat) f, ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * k) = ∑ n f * k
rel_iter.is_digit_fun : forall c q i x y : nat, rel_iter.is_digit c q i x -> rel_iter.is_digit c q i y -> x = y
msum_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (a + b) f = m (msum m u a f) (msum m u b (fun i : nat => f (a + i)))
binary_power_split : forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}
sum_0n_scal_l : forall (n k : nat) f, ∑ n (fun i : nat => k * f i) = k * ∑ n f
Newton_nat_S : forall a n : nat, power n (1 + a) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * power i a)
power_smono_l : forall p q x : nat, 2 <= x -> p < q -> power p x < power q x
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, power n (a + b) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * power (n - i) a * power i b)
prime.base_p_uniq : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall l1 l2 : list nat, Forall2 (fun x y : nat => x < p /\ y < p) l1 l2 -> prime.expand p l1 = prime.expand p l2 -> l1 = l2
bounded_search : forall (m : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n : nat, n < m -> P n + (P n -> False)) -> {n : nat & ((n < m) * P n)%type} + {forall n : nat, n < m -> P n -> False}
power_of_0 : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> power n 0 = 0
nat_join_euclid2 : forall q r1 d1 r2 d2 : nat, r1 < power q 2 -> r2 < power q 2 -> r1 + d1 * power q 2 ⇡ (r2 + d2 * power q 2) = r1 ⇡ r2 + (d1 ⇡ d2) * power q 2
nat_meet_euclid_power_2 : forall q r1 d1 r2 d2 : nat, r1 < power q 2 -> r2 < power q 2 -> (r1 + d1 * power q 2) ⇣ (r2 + d2 * power q 2) = r1 ⇣ r2 + d1 ⇣ d2 * power q 2
plus_lt_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n < m -> p <= q -> n + p < m + q
nat_euclid_pow2_lb : forall n r q : nat, r < power n 2 -> ⟬ r + q * power n 2 ⟭ ≂ ⟬ r ⟭ ↑ lb_shift n ⟬ q ⟭
msum_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (f : nat -> X), msum m u 0 f = u
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial.binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
div_rem_uniq : forall p n1 r1 n2 r2 : nat, p <> 0 -> n1 * p + r1 = n2 * p + r2 -> r1 < p -> r2 < p -> n1 = n2 /\ r1 = r2
div_by_p_lt : forall p n : nat, 2 <= p -> n <> 0 -> div n p < n
mult_lt_compat_r : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> 0 < p -> n * p < m * p
Nat.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
